author: Khaleda Rahman
title: ER Doctor Who Survived Ebola Says He's More Afraid Of Coronavirus After Treating Patients in New York City
description: Craig Spencer, the director of global health at NewYork-Presbyterian/Columbia University Medical Center, described what it's like to treat coronavirus patients in New York City.
content: Craig Spencer, the director of global health at NewYork-Presbyterian/Columbia University Medical Center, went viral on Monday after he tweeted about a 13-hour emergency room shift where more than 90 percent of his patients were either confirmed or presumed to… [+6774 chars]
